rewards.desc:
Our sincere thank you.
==============================GRATITUDE TIER: Our sincere thank you for helping support the game!

Your name in the credits + $1 tier
==============================
ACKNOWLEDGEMENT TIER: Have your name immortalized in the credits of the game! You also receive the $1 tier.

DRM-free digital copy of the game (early bird special) + $5 tier
==============================
EARLY BIRD ADVENTURER TIER: This tier grants you a DRM-free digital copy of the game when it releases. You also receive the $5 tier.

DRM-free digital copy of the game + $5 tier
==============================ADVENTURER TIER: If you missed the Early Bird Adventurer Tier, this tier still grants you a DRM-free digital copy of the game when it releases. You also receive the $5 tier.

A title of your choice next to your name in the credits + $10 tier
=======================================================
ENTREPRENEUR TIER: Not only do you get a digital copy of the game and your name in the credits, you get to choose a title to go alongside your name in the credits (within reason)! You also receive the $10 tier.

Beta access (early bird special) + $10 tier
==============================
EARLY BIRD JOURNEYER TIER: You will receive a beta version of the game before the final game launches. You also receive the $10 tier, which includes the final game when it launches.

Beta access + $10 tier
==============================
JOURNEYER TIER: If you missed the Early Bird Journeyer Tier, this tier still grants you a beta version of the game before the game launches. You also receive the $10 tier, which includes the final game when it launches.

Digital wallpapers + $20 tier ==============================DISPLAY TIER: Upon release of the game, you will receive digital wallpapers, including concept art and unique screenshots. You also receive the $20 tier.

Live soundtrack + $25 tier
==============================
HARMONY TIER: Upon release you will receive a digital copy of the soundtrack for the game, created by M.J. Quigley, the amazing composer on Perspective and Nitronic Rush. You will also receive early versions of the music tracks as they are created. Lastly, you also receive the $25 tier.

In-game hat for the main character + $30 tier ======================================================= WARMTH TIER: A hat in-game that will show up on the main character. You also receive the $30 tier.

Live digital art book + $30 tier
==============================
PROGRESSION TIER: A digital copy of a behind-the-scenes book, showcasing everything during development, including concept art and level design. You will also receive early iterations of the art as it is created. Lastly, you also receive the $30 tier.

Alpha access + $40 tier
==============================
NOMAD TIER: You will have access to the alpha version of the game, before the beta and final versions of the game. You also receive the $40 tier.

NPC in a secret area modeled after you + $50 tier ======================================================= SECRET PERSONIFICATION TIER: We will work with you to create a character in the game modeled after you to show up in a secret area. You will receive a file of the character art. Lastly, you also receive the $50 tier.

NPC modeled after you + $50 tier
==============================
PERSONIFICATION TIER: We will work with you to create a character in the game modeled after you. You will receive a file of the character art. Lastly, you also receive the $50 tier.
An in-game pet dog + $50 tier ==========================================================CANINE COMPANION TIER: A loyal in-game pet dog that follows you around! You also receive the $50 tier.

Livestream access + $50 tier
==============================
UNDISCLOSED TIER: Take a peek at the game while it’s being created. Critique and/or assist in development in the chat, and watch early playthroughs of the game. Gives you access to frequent livestreams of development. You also receive the $50 tier.
An in-game pet dog + $100 tier ==============================================================CANINE COMPANION CAP TIER: An in-game hat for your loyal in-game pet dog. You also receive the $100 tier.

Exclusive builds + $100 tier
==============================
CLASSIFIED TIER: Gain access to top-secret builds as they are created. Includes builds such as the ones used for playtesting, as well as ones that show up at expos and show floors. You also receive the $100 tier.

Name the small town + $250 tier
==============================
DESIGNATION TIER: We will work with you to come up with a name for the small town that the game is set in (within reason). The name will show up in promotional material and possibly the game. You also receive the $250 tier.

Name the main character + $250 tier
==============================
MONIKER TIER: We will work with you to come up with a name for the main character (within reason). The name will show up in promotional material and possibly the game. You also receive the $250 tier.

Executive Producer credit + $250 tier
==============================
EXECUTIVE PRODUCER TIER: You will be credited as Executive Producer in the credits. You also receive the $250 tier.

Custom-designed level + $1000 tier ============================== LEVEL DESIGNER TIER: Work with the designer to create a brand new level for the game (within reason). You also receive the $1000 tier.

Custom-designed main character + $5000 tier ============================== CHARACTER DESIGNER TIER: Work with the artists to create a custom main character for the game (within reason).You also receive the $5000 tier.

items.name: Knite & The Ghost Lights - Wii U - PC - Mac - Linux

rewards.desc:
--- EARLY ACCESS ---

Get Digital Copy of the Game on Mac or PC before it's released.

--- GAME ON - ROCK ON ---

Official Game Sound Track in MP3 format +  early access to the game.
--- MAKING MISTLAND --- A digital book of hi res images and photography detailing the characters of Mistland and the "behind the scenes" creation + plus everything at the $10 and under levels

--- READ ALL ABOUT IT ---
Enjoy a hand written book of poetry from Wilhelm the old oak stump + everything included at the $10 and under levels

--- Play it on Wii U --- You will be given a download from  the Wii U eShop upon the games release PLUS get everything from the $25 tier and below (including early access version of the game for Mac PC and Linux) Please note: game release date is approximate only.

--- CARTOGRAPHERS DELIGHT ---
A beautiful hand-drawn map of Mistland (digital) + everything included at the $25 and under levels

--- Personal Portrait --- Delivered to you a personal sketch made AND signed by Xavier himself. The sketch will be based on your photo. Also a great gift for a child or loved one. **see our update section for a sample of the work ...And of course you will get the previous rewards at this level.

--- The Real Book --- A real full color physical book shipped to you: THE BOOK INCLUDES:
•	Over 40 full color and hi res photos including behind the scenes and more.
•	A collection of  short stories.
•	All four character books combined and in full color  (now including Collection of Kiki’s lullabies)
ALL previous rewards included. Every single one!

--- Your Own Melody --- Enjoy your own personal melody from the ghost piper himself, Knite. All of the melodies will be used in songs on the soundtrack and the name of your melody will be listed in knite's book. Pretty cool, yeah?
A ghost melody from Knite dedicated personally to you! The title is  gonna be in the following format: 

The ghost melody of YOURNAME, whose soul was lost and found on YOURBIRTHDATE. (if you prefer not to share, the year is optional)

Example: The ghost melody of Jennifer Crane, whose soul was lost and found on October 14, 1986.

This can also make a great gift to a friend or child.

An example of Knite's music can be found on the main page.
This also includes ALL previous rewards. Every single one!

--- Kiki's Lullaby --- Since you will already be getting your own melody at $80, Kiki will add some words to it. All of the words will also be in the Grimoire Sister's Book (digital and paper format version). Now you can have something to sing along with your melody! ---- You of course get all the previous rewards, wii u download, portrait, etc, etc

--- YOUR NAME IN STONE ---
Your name appears “in-game” on a unique Mistland Tombstone + everything included at the $50 and under levels

--- CARTOGRAPHERS POSTER --- A beautiful hand-drawn map of Mistland in poster format delivered to you. Final dimensions are yet to be determined. You also get everything included at the previous levels.

--- T-SHIRT TIME ---
An official Knite & The Ghost Lights t-shirt + everything included at the $100 and under levels

--- PERSONALIZED ON CANVAS --- A beautiful hand-drawn map of Mistland on stretched canvas delivered to you. This map will include the addition of a monument marked in Mistland that has been named after you or a loved one(s). Final dimensions are yet to be determined. You also get everything included at the previous levels.
--- OWN A PART OF THE GAME -- Get a real assortment of small props actually used in the game + everything included at the $150 and under levels
--- YOUR OWN KNITE --- An exact model of Knite, hand-crafted by our lead artist + everything included at the $250 and under  levels

--- IF YOU WERE FROM MISTLAND --- An official Mistland character figure, based on a photo provided by you. The perfect custom gift for you or a loved one + plus everything at the $500 and under levels

--- LIVE AND DIE IN MISTLAND --- We'll turn your official Mistland character figure into an actual in-game character (most likely a bad guy). What better way to show off to your friends and  digitally live forever.  The actual hand crafted doll based on your photo will be in the game!!.  + plus everything at the $1000 and under levels

EARLY BIRD EXPLORER                  
==============================
Digital copy of the game for PC and Mac, at a lower price available only through this Kickstarter.

EXPLORER                  
==============================
A digital copy of the game for PC and Mac.

SONGSMITH ============================== 
Receive a digital copy of the all-original Moon Hunters OST by Ryan Roth, guest-starring Halina Heron, normally a $10 value.
============================== Also includes a digital copy of the game for PC and Mac.

EARLY BIRD DYNAMIC DUO
==============================
Why play alone when you can share your experience with a friend? Two digital copies of the game, at a lower price available only through this kickstarter. PLUS an invitation to our beta tests!
==============================
Also includes the all-original soundtrack by Ryan Roth.

DYNAMIC DUO
==============================
Why play alone when you can share your experience with a friend? Two digital copies of the game.  PLUS an invitation to our beta tests!
==============================
Also includes: All-original soundtrack by Ryan Roth.

PEN PAL ============================== We'll send you a physical postcard signed by the core dev team, in the real world. This is also the first tier in which we will list your name in the game's Special Thanks. NOTE: This is the ONLY TIER that offers the postcard, other than the Super Collector tier.
============================== Also includes: Soundtrack, beta invite, and a digital copy of the game.

BAND OF HEROES
==============================
Everything's more fun when you're adventuring together! Buy a 4-pack! Four digital copies of the game, for the price of three!
==============================
Also includes: Soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta tests.

FASHION LEGEND ==============================
Get a limited edition charcoal-grey cotton "Moonblade" T-Shirt to impress your tribe, available only in this Kickstarter. NOTE: This is THE ONLY TIER that offers the T-Shirt, other than the Super Collector tier.
============================== Also includes: Soundtrack, inclusion in Special Thanks, an invitation to our early beta tests, and a digital copy of the game for PC and Mac.

ART COLLECTOR
==============================
This tier includes a limited-edition 12x18" poster print of your choice from four designs, signed by the core team. NOTE: This is THE ONLY TIER that offers the signed poster print, other than the Super Collector tier.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, and a digital copy of the game.

WEAVER
==============================
For those who see the strands that bind our patterns together. This tier includes a limited-edition fabric print on Belgian linen, from your choice of five designs: a world map or one of the four base characters (Witch, Spellblade, Occultist, Druid). NOTE: This is THE ONLY TIER that offers the fabric print, other than the Super Collector tier.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, and a digital copy of the game.

NAME A VILLAGER
==============================
This tier gives you the right to name a human character (within reason), to be included in the final game. Character gender (male, female, other), species (human/Silkhood) and home-tribe are your choice. We will accommodate basic customization requests, within the limits of the Moon Hunters world.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, and TWO digital copies of the game.

NAME AN ANIMAL
==============================
This tier gives you the right to name an animal (within reason), to be included in the final game. Species included will be at least, but not limited to: dogs, cats, birds, moths, camels, turkeys, alpacas. We can probably accommodate special customisation/species requests.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, and TWO digital copies of the game.

LEGEND
==============================
You will be remembered. An ancient stone memorial will hold your message of choice (within reason), to be randomly generated in the world of the final game.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, and FOUR digital copies of the game.

SUPER COLLECTOR: ALL PHYSICALS
==============================
Includes all physical rewards. This means: a signed poster print, a T-shirt, a fabric print, and Thank You postcard signed by the core team.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, and FOUR digital copies of the game.

SUPER COLLECTOR (SECOND RUN)
============================== Includes all physical rewards. This means: a signed poster print, a T-shirt, a fabric print, and Thank You postcard signed by the core team.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks and FOUR digital copies of the game.

PIXEL MOON HUNTER
==============================
We will delve deep in the pixelmines to find the right pigments to paint a pixel-art likeness of the person of your choice in the Moon Hunters style, from a supplied photograph (no nudies please). With your permission, we may use this sprite in the game.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, an in-game memorial with your customised message, and FOUR digital copies of the game.

PAINTED MOON HUNTER
==============================
Xin Ran Liu will hand-paint a watercolor likeness of the person of your choice in the Moon Hunters style, using a supplied photograph (within reason). The final portrait can be a digital file, OR mailed to you on real life parchment. If you choose a digital file, with your permission we will add it to the game as a speaking non-playable character, where it will be seen by thousands of players.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, an in-game memorial with your customised message, and FOUR digital copies of the game.

MYTHOLOGIST
==============================
Ready to spin a yarn for the ages? You will help us create a whole character myth (within reason) with up to ten dialogues, that thousands of players will experience. You will be given your choice of pre-created characters to design with, and be credited as an Assistant Narrative Designer for your contribution.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, an in-game memorial with your customised message, and FOUR digital copies of the game.

VISIONARY
==============================
So boss fights are kinda your 'thing'? You will help us design a boss fight or other major combat encounter (within reason). We'll work with you to nail down the perfect look, strategies, effects, and special moves, and credit you as an Assistant Combat Designer for your contribution.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, an in-game memorial with your customised message, and TEN digital copies of the game.

DIRECTOR
==============================
Join the team for a day! You get to help with ALL of the above design (name a villager, name an animal, design a myth, design a boss fight). For your contribution, you'll be credited in the game as a Designer.
==============================
Also includes: soundtrack, an invitation to our early beta, inclusion in Special Thanks, an in-game memorial with your customised message, and TEN digital copies of the game.
A unique, hand drawn "Thank You" sketch sent to you in the mail. As well as a Hi-Res "Spate" desktop Wallpaper. Your name will also be added to the games credits.
